definitions.definition: Of an animal: walking on the toes , putting the weight of the body mainly on the ball of the foot , with the back of the foot, or heel , raised .
Of feet or a manner of walking: of, resembling, or pertaining to that of a digitigrade animal .
Belonging to the Digitigrada of the taxonomic order Carnivora .

main_definition: ( zoology ) Of an animal: walking on the toes , putting the weight of the body mainly on the ball of the foot , with the back of the foot, or heel , raised .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) Of feet or a manner of walking: of, resembling, or pertaining to that of a digitigrade animal .
( zoology , specifically ) Belonging to the Digitigrada of the taxonomic order Carnivora .
